### Introduction

<img src="images/photo1.jpg" style="width:75%">

Hello my name is Jessie! I am currently a 2nd year MPH student at Columbia University, with a concentration in Epidemiology and certificate in Public Health Research Methods. My public health interests are in global health, urban design, and social determinants of health.
